text: Allen J. McCarthy (born February 24, 1970) is an American lawyer and politician who represented the 7th Plymouth District in the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 2007 to 2011. ==Early life & education== He was born in Boston and graduated from East Bridgewater High School in 1988.Q&A; with 7th Plymouth state rep candidate Allen McCarthyEast Bridgewater High School (Class of 1988) Yearbook He graduated from Boston College with a Bachelor of Arts degree in political science in 1992 and from Boston College Law School with a Juris Doctor in 1995.Martindale Hubbell Online Directory ProfileEB HOPE Welcomes Allen McCarthy to the Board of Directors! ==Legal career== From 1995 to 2000, he served as an assistant district attorney in the Middlesex County District Attorney’s Office. He also served as the District Court Supervisor for Lowell District Court. From 2000 to 2008 he worked in private practice in Boston and in South Shore as a litigation attorney. He formerly served as the counsel to the School Transportation Association of Massachusetts. He practices law in West Bridgewater. ==Political career== He served in the Massachusetts House of Representatives as a Democrat representing the 7th Plymouth district from 2007 to 2011.Representative Allen J. McCarthy, Served 2007 - 2010 - 7th Plymouth ==Personal life== He and his wife Diane have three children. They live in East Bridgewater. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:People from East Bridgewater, Massachusetts Category:Boston College alumni Category:Boston College Law School alumni Category:Massachusetts Democrats Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Boston Category:Members of the Massachusetts House of Representatives Category:Politicians from Boston Category:20th-century American lawyers Category:21st-century American lawyers Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Allen McCarthy
